content.prompt: Based on the passage, which of the following Jacobin policies best explains Maréchal’s favorable view of the Constitution of 1793?

choices.label: The imposition of the Reign of Terror
The fixing of prices and wages
The pursuit of the war against the monarchies of Europe

unit.text: 5: Conflict, Crisis, and Reaction in the Late 18th Century

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
